title: Thought it was very entertaining
review: I thought this movie was great. I'm surprised by some of the negative reviews. I watched it with 5 buddies and we all thought it was pretty clever. The cinematography was fantastic and I loved the characters. I would definitely recommend this film.

title: convict on the run
review: Two inept deputies go after an escaped convict in the adirondacks. the movie is going for dark humor. it doesn't really work, but I have seen a lot worse movies. the very low rating is not really deserved.

title: It's beyond me....
review:
...but the scenery is very scenic; the music is quite tuneful. Two stars.
Words fail me. This is an abysmal movie. Devoid of humour. Surely this should go straight to video.
